content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill has no fuel, furnace has no fuel
-  Another furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0) has no ingredients

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0) with no fuel
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5) which is not connected
-  Pipe groups at positions (x=107.5 y=-34.5) and (x=105.5 y=-32.5) with one being empty and the other having full output

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) which is working
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5) which is working
-  Belt group at position (x=40.5 y=-83.5) which is empty

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors due to lack of fuel
-  Ensure that burner mining drills and furnaces have sufficient fuel to operate
-  Ensure that boilers have sufficient fuel to operate

### Errors due to lack of ingredients
-  Ensure that furnaces have sufficient ingredients to operate

### Errors due to disconnection
-  Ensure that steam engines are connected to the power grid

### Errors due to empty or full pipe groups
-  Ensure that pipe groups are properly managed to avoid empty or full output states

### Errors due to not being plugged into electric network
-  Ensure that electricity groups are properly plugged into the electric network

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
